definition: in the middle of the street/facing the street
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at

sentences.english: Baby’s Day Out was a hilarious movie loved equally by children and adults.
sentences.chinese: 《小鬼當街》是一部深受孩子和大人歡迎的喜劇電影。

sentences.english: "We have taken a number of these people off the streets. We have arrested about 50 people," a senior security official said.
sentences.chinese: 據一位高級警官透露，警察已當街逮捕了近50人。

sentences.english: Then he will face charges of street fouling prosecution.
sentences.chinese: 接下來他將面臨當街便溺罪名的起訴。
